Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Halifax in 1978...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/1979, off Elly Mae Clampett (PON)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Rightfield in 1979...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Coney Island on 4/14/1980...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Capital City on 8/19/1980...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1981, hitting .385 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1981, hitting .337 with 5 HR, 26 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Pontiac on 10/18/1981...
Drove in 6 runs against Coney Island on 6/8/1982...
Drove in 7 runs against Troy on 6/19/1983...
Drove in 6 runs against Longport on 7/5/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1984, hitting .550 with 4 HR, 15 RBI...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against West Texas on 9/12/1984...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Syracuse on 8/27/1985...
Drove in 7 runs against West Texas on 5/4/1986...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1986, hitting .379 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Pontiac on 9/22/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1986, hitting .440 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1986, hitting .386 with 6 HR, 28 RBI...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1986, hitting .327 with 32 HR, 133 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1987, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 19 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Pontiac on 8/13/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1987, hitting .630 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/7/1988, hitting .588 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1989, hitting .295 with 29 HR, 101 RBI...
